body_html:
I think what you mean is you are using the feature of DoubleBackward and LogSoftMax is not yet ready. Just wanted to clarify language for future context.

Yes. Thanks for clarification.
Closing the issue as the feature is now implemented in commit 61c873c

body:
> I think what you mean is you are using the feature of DoubleBackward and LogSoftMax is not yet ready. Just wanted to clarify language for future context.

Yes. Thanks for clarification.
Closing the issue as the feature is now implemented in commit https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/61c873cc7dc0d752901054decfbaff1ea79b398e
